creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: square blue panel with radiating squares of embroidery and red appliqué; predominately purple and white embroidery; central multicolored rectangle in cross stitch with stepped triangle motifs; red appliqué bands stitched with blue, white and purple; long tassels with beads at top on three sides--red and maroon; short blue knotted fringe on fourth side
dimension: 24 7/8 x 20 3/4 in. (63.18 x 52.71 cm) (without tassels or fringe)
title: Ceremonial bridal headdress
